titleStmt.title: A declaration of the last demands propounded by his Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax, and the Councell of his Army to both Houses of Parliament, for vindication of the Parliament, for justice, and for the peace of the kingdome: with the answer of the House of Peers, and their approbation and order to returne thankes to the Gen: and the army.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army. Council.

titleStmt.title: A declaration of the last demands propounded by his Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax, and the Councell of his Army to both Houses of Parliament, for vindication of the Parliament, for justice, and for the peace of the kingdome: with the answer of the House of Peers, and their approbation and order to returne thankes to the Gen: and the army.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army. Council.
Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

notesStmt.note: The declaration is dated at end: At the head Quarters of Kinston (sic) upon Thames, August 18. 1647.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aug: 21 [?; ink has bled] 1647".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
